Way.Com India Pvt Ltd is seeking a highly analytical and results-oriented SEO Specialist to lead and implement organic growth strategies focused on driving qualified traffic and lead generation. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience in B2B, SaaS, E-commerce, or Fintech sectors, along with a solid understanding of modern SEO tools, data analysis, and technical optimization. This role demands a strategic thinker who can convert business objectives into measurable SEO performance.

Key Responsibilities:

SEO Strategy & Execution

  • Develop and execute comprehensive on-page and off-page SEO strategies aligned with lead generation objectives.
  • Conduct in-depth keyword research and competitive analysis, particularly within the B2B and Fintech sectors.
  • Perform technical SEO audits using tools such as Screaming Frog, Ahrefs, SEMrush, and similar platforms to ensure optimal website health.

Data Analytics & Performance Reporting

  • Monitor and analyze SEO performance using GA4, Google Search Console, and Looker Studio.
  • Create actionable insights and custom dashboards to visualize trends, traffic channels, keyword performance, and ROI.

Content & On-Page Optimization

  • Collaborate with content and product marketing teams to optimize website pages, blog articles, and product descriptions.
  • Develop content briefs based on keyword intent, topic clusters, and evolving search behavior trends.

Link Building & Outreach

  • Plan and execute white-hat backlink strategies to improve domain authority and boost SERP positions.
  • Manage external relationships with publishers, vendors, and content platforms to support link-building initiatives.

Performance & KPI Ownership

  • Define and track key SEO metrics including organic traffic, keyword rankings, leads, and conversions.
  • Continuously identify growth opportunities, experiment with scalable SEO tactics, and deliver measurable results aligned with quarterly goals.

Required Skills & Qualifications:

  • 2–5 years of hands-on SEO experience within B2B, SaaS, e-commerce, or Fintech companies.
  • Strong proficiency in tools such as GA4, Google Search Console, Looker Studio, and Tableau.
  • Experience using SEMrush, Ahrefs, and Screaming Frog for comprehensive SEO analysis.
  • In-depth knowledge of technical SEO, including Core Web Vitals, site architecture, and crawlability.
  • A data-driven mindset with the ability to transform analytical insights into actionable SEO strategies.
  • Proven experience in target-oriented SEO execution and performance reporting.
  • Background in lead generation-focused environments, with clear success metrics.
  • Basic familiarity with HTML, CSS, and CMS platforms such as WordPress, Webflow, or HubSpot.
  • Strong ability to collaborate with product, engineering, and content teams for cross-functional alignment.

Nice to Have:

  • Previous experience working in a Fintech marketing environment.
  • Exposure to marketing automation tools and CRM integrations.
  • Understanding of CRO (Conversion Rate Optimization), UX best practices, and A/B testing methodologies.
  • Knowledge of localization and international SEO strategies for U.S. and global markets.

What Success Looks Like:

  • Demonstrated growth in organic traffic and qualified lead generation.
  • Consistently meeting or exceeding keyword ranking and traffic KPIs.
  • Decreasing reliance on paid marketing by strengthening the organic acquisition funnel.
  • Establishing a comprehensive SEO performance dashboard and a structured insights framework.

Contact Information: careers@way.com
